patterns: what if im not from ontario
I'm not from Ontario, what government aid options do I have?
Are there government aid programs for students outside of Ontario?
What should I do if I'm not from Ontario?
Are there government aid programs for students in provinces or territories outside of Ontario?
I'm from another province, what government aid is available for me?
responses: Apply for the government loan/grant program in your home province, territory or state. Find more info on government aid programs outside Ontario.: https://registrar.mcmaster.ca/aid-awards/osap-government-aid/#tab-50

patterns: What if im a US student

Are there specific financial aid options for U.S. students?
Can students from the United States access government student loans?
What funding opportunities are available for U.S. students?
responses: U.S. students can apply for government student loans through the U.S. Department of Educationâ€™s William D. Ford Federal Direct Loan Program. Learn more about funding options for U.S. students. https://registrar.mcmaster.ca/funding-for-u-s-students/

patterns: Do I apply for funding through the Ontario Student Assistance Program (OSAP) or my provincial student aid program?
Which program should I apply to for funding, OSAP or my provincial student aid?
Should I submit my funding application to OSAP or my provincial student aid program?
How do I know if I should apply for funding through OSAP or my provincial student aid program?
Is OSAP the right option for funding, or should I consider my provincial student aid program?
What factors determine whether I apply for funding through OSAP or my provincial student aid program?
responses: Apply for OSAP if Ontario is the last Canadian province that you have resided in for at least 12 consecutive months without being a full-time post-secondary (college or university) student (i.e. prior to starting post-secondary studies) and you meet all other eligibility criteria Denied by your province? Please visit Student Services: https://registrar.mcmaster.ca/#contactinformation

patterns: How is my provincial aid application processed?
What is the process for processing my provincial aid application?
Can you explain how my application for provincial aid is processed?
Is there information on how my provincial aid application is processed?
Can you provide details on the processing of provincial aid applications?
Where can I find guidance on the processing of my application for provincial aid?
responses: For information on how your provincial aid application is processed, visit: https://registrar.mcmaster.ca/aid-awards/osap-government-aid/#tab-50
